name: Lost in Constellation
description:
A Global Game Jam 2021 game, with the theme Lost and Found!
You play as a valkyrie-light orb. Valkyrie from Norse mythology is a female figure who choose those who may die in battle and those who may live. Rescue fallen and dying stars and help them back up to their constellation, and drawing in the missing lines. Are you maybe on your own journey to get back up in a constellation?


WASD or arrow keys to move, hold space to jump and draw.

Link to GGJ page: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-constellation-3

Credits:

Art: Thea Sofie Myrbråten

Programming: Jonas Ludvik Odden

Sound: Peter Morrello
